ch.cern.dod.ui.model

Class OtherInstancesModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zul.AbstractListModel
      • ch.cern.dod.ui.model.OtherInstancesModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.zkoss.zul.ext.Selectable, org.zkoss.zul.ListModel

    public class OtherInstancesModel
extends org.zkoss.zul.AbstractListModel
    Represents a list of instances. This model is used in the instance view, where there is a list of instances for quick access.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
